This issue only impacts new changes, existing sites and traffic to those sites are not affected.

incidents.name: Cloudflare Dashboard and Cloudflare Workers/Pages API service issues

incident_updates.body:
Between 16:05 UTC to 16:26 UTC, Cloudflare had issues with Cloudflare Dashboard and related Workers/Pages APIs.

These issues did not affect the execution of already deployed assets, the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

Customers using the Dashboard or Workers/Pages were impacted as requests might have failed and/or errors may have displayed.

incidents.name: Cloudflare Pages — Functions live logs issues

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We have determined that the impact is slightly elevated error rates when starting to tail logs. This can be worked around by waiting 60 seconds before trying again if errors occur. The full fix will be applied within the next 24 hours.
Cloudflare is aware of and investigating an issue with streaming Functions logs on Cloudflare Pages deployments. Traffic to those deployments is not affected.
This incident has been resolved.

incidents.name: GitHub outage causing build issues for Cloudflare Pages and Cloudflare API docs

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Cloudflare is aware of and investigating an issue with Cloudflare Pages builds which potentially impacts multiple customers. GitHub users may not be able to push changes to their repos, or pushed changes may fail to or be delayed in propagating to Cloudflare Pages. These changes may not be deployed, or may be delayed. This issue only impacts new changes, existing sites and traffic to those sites are not affected. In effect, the Cloudflare API docs may be down for certain users as well.
This incident has been resolved.
